modules.description: Performs pattern matching and extraction using Perl-compatible regular expressions. Operates on strings and captures grouped submatches. Enables precise text parsing and validation tasks such as extracting email domains or parsing log entries.

The module provides functions for compiling, matching, and manipulating Perl-compatible regular expressions, including substitution, splitting, and extraction of substrings. It operates on strings, compiled regex patterns, and input channels, enabling tasks like text transformation and log parsing. Use cases include advanced pattern matching, data extraction from structured text, and low-level regex execution with customizable handling of flags and callouts.
